token_info.name: Constellation Planets [wired]
token_info.description: If bowling alley carpets were animated. Progression exploring some directions from another piece | Controls: Click the arrow in the bottom right or use keyboard: n = new constellation, b = boom, 1-6 = speed, c = toggle camera rotation direction, v = toggle between auto rotation and mouse control (click and drag) | Amy Goodchild | Twitter - @amygoodchild | Instagram - @amy_goodchild | www.amygoodchild.com | p5js, interactive html
